name: Customer Response Workflow
description: Automated response to customer inquiries, support requests, and service issues

subtasks.title: Acknowledge customer request
subtasks.description: Send immediate confirmation to customer that their request has been received and is being processed

subtasks.title: Investigate customer issue
subtasks.description: Analyze the customer's problem, gather relevant information, and identify root cause

subtasks.title: Develop response solution
subtasks.description: Create appropriate response or solution based on investigation findings

subtasks.title: Respond to customer
subtasks.description: Provide comprehensive response to customer with solution or next steps

subtasks.title: Follow up for satisfaction
subtasks.description: Check back with customer to ensure issue is resolved and they are satisfied
